thread.title: A. Nayak
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by A. Nayak

author: A. Nayak
title: A. Nayak
text: Robin Sabine, Travel Consultant from Cost Rican Vacations did a great job in arranging the entire 7 day trip after discussing and understanding my interests and needs. We had a great time and enjoyed the vacation. All transportations and the individual tour companies that took us to different sites were great and I highly recommend them.
